title: I can't see my club
body:
I have a problem where I can't see my club and I don't have the club tag showing up in game. I'm the owner of the club.
Club name: hwasa is the best waifu
Club tag: kpop

replies.body: I looked into this and refreshed your club, so everything looks good to go now.  Let me know if you still have any issues!

Hello,
the same thing happened to my club.
Full name :Zhe Jews
Tags : Zjew
Server : Euw
i cant see it but my friends can do it

Could you take a look at our club too (eune)?
Club name: Bananpojkarna
Tag: Nanab

Hi there, I believe I'm having the same problem as OP. I can't see any evidence that my club exists from my client, but the people in my club can still see it from theirs. If you could work your magic on my account, I would be very appreciative. My sn is Menos Unhinged.

hi riot support, i have encountered the same issue as well where i am the leader and can't c my own club, the club name is " ft boiz", if u could refresh mine too, it would help a lot. :D thx very much!
